Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah ruled out of Champions Trophy, one more surprise in final squad
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah (Getty Images)

Poll How Big Is Bumrah’s Absence For The Team? Limited Impact Major Setback

India’s Squad for ICC Champions Trophy 2025

NEW DELHI: In a significant blow to Team India, star fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah has been ruled out of the 2025 ICC Champions Trophy due to a lower back injury . The Indian cricket board confirmed the development on Monday, announcing that young pacer Harshit Rana will replace Bumrah in the squad.Bumrah’s absence leaves a major gap in India's pace attack , as he has been a key performer in the team’s bowling lineup.However, the selection committee has placed its trust in Harshit Rana, who has impressed with his performances in domestic cricket and the IPL.In another change, spinner Varun Chakaravarthy has been included in the squad, replacing Yashasvi Jaiswal.The left-handed opener was initially part of the provisional squad but will now serve as a non-travelling reserve along with Mohammed Siraj and Shivam Dube . These three players will remain on standby and travel to Dubai if needed.The squad still boasts a strong mix of experience and youth, with Rohit Sharma leading the team. With Bumrah’s injury posing a setback, India will be hoping their new inclusions step up as they aim for ICC glory.Rohit Sharma (Captain), Shubman Gill (Vice-captain), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (WK), Rishabh Pant (WK), Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Mohd. Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.
Article Summary: Jasprit bumrah has been ruled out of the 2025 icc champions trophy due to a lower back injury. The indian cricket board confirmed the development on monday, announcing that young pacer harshit rana will replace him in the squad. Spinner varun chakaravarthy has been included in the team, replacing yashasvi jaiswal.

Article Title: “That was an awkward interview”: Fans reacted to FOX Reporter Erin Andrews' interview with Super Bowl MVP Jalen Hurts
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Jalen Hurts' postgame interaction with Erin Andrews effectively captured attention

The Philadelphia Eagles won their second Super Bowl in franchise history by defeating the Kansas City Chiefs 40-22 in New Orleans. Jalen Hurts, the Eagles' quarterback, was the Most Valuable Player of Super Bowl LIX, racking up 293 yards of offense and three touchdowns. He scored the opening touchdown on Philadelphia's famous "Brotherly Shove" play. Hurts' composure after winning his first Super Bowl ring was met with Fox sideline reporter Erin Andrews, leaving fans in awe.Jalen Hurts and the Philadelphia Eagles defeated the Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl LIX, securing a 40-22 final score, and Hurts later spoke with Fox Sports' sideline reporter Erin Andrews about the game. Two years ago, during Super Bowl LVII, Hurts and the Eagles lost to the Chiefs. After the game, Kansas City confetti rained, and Hurts saved a photo from that moment as his screensaver.Erin Andrews asked Hurts about the confetti during their postgame conversation. "Look at the confetti. That was the picture you had on your screen saver, the confetti from two years ago. How does it look?” Andrews asked. "Still processing it," Hurts responded with a smile. "I just can't wait to enjoy this with my family.”"Full circle moment with Jalen Hurts and the confetti as Erin Andrews pointed out. Maybe Jalen will finally update his screensaver," one fan wrote. "Erin Andrews yelling at Jalen Hurts to LOOK AT THE CONFETTI," another said. "Great moment by Erin Andrews Jalen Hurts about the confetti. Covered in the pre-game," another added. "That was an awkward interview between Erin Andrews and Jalen Hurts," another wrote.Selected by the Eagles in the second round of the 2020 NFL draft, Jalen Hurts became their starter near the end of his rookie season. Hurts had a breakout season in 2022, leading the Eagles to their conference's top seed and an appearance in Super Bowl LVII, earning him Pro Bowl and second-team All-Pro honors.Also Read: FOX Reporter Erin Andrews' 2008 stalking ordeal brings attention to legal gaps and prompts efforts for stronger laws In the 2024 season, Jalen Hurts led the Eagles to victory in Super Bowl LIX, winning Super Bowl MVP and becoming the first Eagles quarterback to make multiple Super Bowl appearances and the second after Nick Foles to win it. In total, he has led Philadelphia to the playoffs in all four of his seasons as the primary starter and has received two Pro Bowl selections.
Article Summary: Jalen hurts and the philadelphia eagles defeated the kansas city chiefs 40-22 in super bowl lix. Hurts was named the most valuable player of the game. After the game, hurts spoke with fox sports' sideline reporter erin andrews. Andrews asked hurts about the confetti from two years ago.

Article Title: Kendrick Lamar Super Bowl LIX Halftime Show: Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl LIX Halftime Show: Every Hidden References You Missed
Article Text:
City Digest

The “Gloria” Jacket: A Personal and Artistic Tribute

GNX

Samuel L. Jackson as Uncle Sam: A Commentary on Censorship

Not Like Us

Red, White & Blue Dancers: A Subtle (or Not-So-Subtle) Political Message

Serena Williams and the C-Walk: A Cultural Moment

“Game Over”: A Final Shot at Drake

"They tried to rig the game, but you can't fake influence."

“Game over”

The Muscle Car: A Symbol of His Journey

Palestine and Sudan Flag Banner: An Unplanned Protest

A Performance That Will Be Analyzed for Years

Super Bowl halftime shows are often grand spectacles, but Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl LIX performance was something entirely different. It wasn’t just a show—it was a statement. With a mix of deep symbolism, cultural nods, and bold artistic choices, Lamar turned the stage into a storytelling platform that left fans talking long after the final note. From hidden messages in his wardrobe to surprise celebrity appearances, here’s everything that made this performance unforgettable.One of the most striking visual elements of the night was Lamar’s jacket, which prominently displayed the word “GLORIA” across the front. At first glance, this seemed like a direct nod to his song “Gloria” from his highly anticipated upcoming album. However, the significance ran much deeper. The word “Gloria”—which translates to “glory” in Spanish—encapsulated Lamar’s unwavering commitment to his craft, his relentless pursuit of artistic excellence, and his place in the pantheon of hip-hop’s greats. More than just a fashion statement, the jacket served as a powerful emblem of his belief in music as a transformative force—one that can elevate, challenge, and ultimately shape culture.In a surprise moment, Hollywood icon Samuel L. Jackson took the stage dressed as Uncle Sam, a well-known symbol of the U.S. government. His presence wasn’t just for show—Jackson's character praised Lamar for “slowing things down” before the rapper launched into his now-infamous performance of, a diss track aimed at Drake. The moment was seen as a critique of the way mainstream institutions attempt to control and censor artists who speak truth to power.Lamar’s dancers were dressed in solid red, white, and blue outfits. Some thought this was a reference to gang culture, but others saw a deeper meaning. At one point, the dancers formed the American flag, with Lamar literally dividing them—possibly making a statement about the divisions in America today. It was a visual representation of the struggles faced by Black artists navigating the complexities of fame, power, and societal expectations.Tennis superstar Serena Williams shocked fans when she took the stage and performed the C-Walk, a dance move deeply rooted in West Coast hip-hop culture. This wasn’t just a fun dance moment—it was a powerful cultural statement. And given Williams' past rumored relationship with Drake, some saw it as an added jab in the ongoing Lamar-Drake feud.Lamar didn’t hold back when it came to his beef with Drake. Midway through his performance, he dropped the line,It was a direct response to Drake’s recent lawsuit and a declaration of Lamar’s dominance in the industry. He wrapped up the set with the phrase, making it clear that, in his mind, the battle was already won.Lamar started the performance in a black Buick GNX, a car with deep personal significance. The Buick GNX is a symbol of classic American muscle, but it’s also a direct reference to his past and his journey from Compton to superstardom. The car, which has been referenced in his music before, represents resilience, struggle, and triumph.One unexpected moment came when a protester pulled out a banner featuring the flags of Palestine and Sudan, along with a heart and a raised fist. The individual was quickly removed from the stage, but the image spread rapidly online. While this wasn’t part of Lamar’s planned performance, it added another layer of political discourse to the night.Kendrick Lamar didn’t just perform at Super Bowl LIX—he made a statement. From his outfit choices to his guest appearances, every aspect of the show carried meaning. Whether you saw it as a lyrical masterpiece, a cultural battle, or a political statement, one thing is certain: Lamar’s halftime show wasn’t just entertainment—it was history in the making.Also read - Super Bowl LIX Halftime Show: Everything that went wrong with the Kendrick Lamar performance
Article Summary: Kendrick lamar’s super bowl lix performance was something entirely different. With a mix of deep symbolism, cultural nods, and bold artistic choices, lamar turned the stage into a storytelling platform that left fans talking long after the final note.

Article Title: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers eyeing $25 million Philadelphia 76ers center to boost LeBron James' Championship hopes
Article Text:
Mo Bamba (Image via Getty)

Los Angeles Lakers

"If the Lakers decide to free up a roster spot to go after a center-sized center who can play some defense, dunk lobs, and hit the occasional open 3 for good measure, there is no better option on the open market right now than Mo Bamba,"

LeBron James of the Lakers (Image via Adam Pantozzi/NBAE/Getty Images)

"Suddenly free to sign with any team in the NBA except for the Clippers, Mo Bamba could join the Lakers, fill a reserve roll on the court for 20 or so minutes a night, and hopefully prove to be more of a positive than a negative with his on-court play,"

The’ pursuit of a reliable center took an unexpected turn when the proposed trade for Charlotte Hornets ’ Mark Williams fell through. ESPN’s Shams Charania reported that the deal was rescinded after Williams failed his physical, leaving the Lakers scrambling for alternatives. With the trade deadline passed, the team now looks to free agency and the buyout market to bolster their frontcourt.One name emerging as a potential solution is former Philadelphia 76ers and Los Angeles Clippers center Mo Bamba . ClutchPoints predicts the Los Angeles Lakers will target Bamba, who is currently a free agent.wrote ClutchPoints’ Matty Breisch.Mo Bamba, 26, last played for the Clippers this season, averaging 4.6 points and 4.3 rebounds on 46.6% shooting. While his numbers don’t jump off the page, his familiarity with the Los Angeles Lakers organization and the city of Los Angeles could make him a seamless fit. Bamba briefly donned the purple and gold in 2023 before being traded to the 76ers.Breisch added.Bamba’s skill set aligns with the Los Angeles Lakers’ needs. Standing at 7 feet tall, he brings rim protection, rebounding, and the ability to stretch the floor with his three-point shooting. While he may not match the potential of Mark Williams, Bamba offers a cost-effective and available option for a team in desperate need of frontcourt depth.The Lakers’ front office has limited choices as the postseason approaches. Signing Mo Bamba could provide stability and allow the team to focus on integrating him into their system. For now, all eyes are on whether the Los Angeles Lakers will make the move official and how Bamba might contribute to their playoff push.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Golden State Warriors flirt with $21.5 million Atlanta Hawks forward as secret weapon for Stephen Curry’s playoff dreams Let us know in the comments below if you think this buyout could help LeBron James secure a championship this season. With Luka Doncic on their roster, the Lakers will aim to make the most of the remaining years of James' career.
Article Summary: Mo bamba, 26, last played for the clippers this season, averaging 4.6 points and 4.3 rebounds. Bamba briefly donned the purple and gold in 2023 before being traded to the 76ers. Standing at 7 feet tall, he brings rim protection, rebounding, and the ability to stretch the floor with his three-point shooting.

Article Title: Alex Bregman’s free agency takes a new turn as Chicago Cubs shut down Alex Bregman talk, focus on current roster ahead of 2025 season
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Chicago Cubs Says The Team Is Not Focusing On Acquiring Alex Bregman Currently And Is Focused “On The Guys They Have In Camp”



Chicago Cubs Might Not Be A “Good” Choice For Alex Bregman, According To ESPN Analyst



Alex Bregman has been a free agent for a pretty long time after he entered free agency at the end of the 2024 season of Major League Baseball. The star player has also attracted widespread criticism after he rejected his former team, Houston Astros’ offer for a whopping $156 million for six years. While there have been strong rumours of the Chicago Cubs being interested in the star player, the team now has spoken about it and it has shocked fans.Recently, the Chicago Cubs had their first news conference and when the executives were asked about the possibility of signing Alex Bregman before the opening day, the answer was pretty unexpected.As per Bob Nightengale, Jed Hoyer, the Chicago Cubs’ president of baseball operations said, "I think you always look for opportunity, but right now we're going to focus on the guys we have in camp. That’s the plan."This was not something that Alex Bregman’s fans were expecting. A fan took to X and wrote, “Who really knows what’s going to happen with Bregman”, while another fan wrote, “Bregman is starting to look greedy. Don't even know if I want him back on the AStros.”Apart from the Chicago Cubs, Alex Bregman has also received interests from the Toronto Blue Jays and the Boston Red Sox but nothing has really been confirmed yet and he still remains a free agent.Recently, ESPN’s Jesse Rogers appeared on an episode of ESPN’s Baseball Tonight and warned Alex Bregman to not consider joining the Chicago Cubs.He said, “I went to Baseball Savant, went to the Park Factors leaderboards, sorted by right-handed hitters, and just examined how much of a liability he would be playing in, in Wrigley Field. It is the most difficult ballpark of any for a right-handed hitter to double. Which is basically the most important skill that Alex Bregman needs to be chasing.”The sports analyst also added that it would be better for Alex Bregman’s career if he chooses the Toronto Blue Jays or the Boston Red Sox over the Chicago Cubs.While the Chicago Cubs have spoken about Alex Bregman’s situation and has confused fans more, Alex Bregman has not yet issued a statement about this. Fans and experts have slammed and criticised Alex Bregman for not going ahead with the Houston Astros’ offer for $156 million. But Alex Bregman has remained silent over all of these controversies.With Pete Alonso signing a new deal with his former team, the New York Mets, after initially rejecting them, fans are also slamming their common agent, Scott Boras, for not being able to provide Alex Bregman a good deal.With the 2025 season beginning soon, fans and experts are waiting for Alex Bregman’s next moves.Also Read: Alex Bregman’s wife, Reagan Bregman, celebrates Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl performance, with no mention of Alex
Article Summary: Chicago cubs say they are not interested in signing alex bregman. Espn's jesse rogers said that the chicago cubs might not be a good choice for the star player. The toronto blue jays and boston red sox have also expressed an interest in the player.

Article Title: Chiefs owner’s daughter, Gracie Hunt, speaks out on Donald Trump’s recent post about Kansas City Chiefs
Article Text:
President Donald Trump will watch the Super Bowl live, becoming the first sitting US president to do so. He has shown support for the Kansas City Chiefs, hinting at quarterback Patrick Mahomes. Chiefs' owner's daughter, Gracie Hunt, praised Trump's support. The Chiefs, facing the Philadelphia Eagles, aim to win Super Bowl LIX which begins at 6:30 PM ET.

Clark Hunt’s Daughter, Gracie Hunt Talks About Donald Trump’s Post On X About Kansas City Chiefs



The Philadelphia Eagles Are Ready To Face The Kansas City Chiefs At Super Bowl LIX



The Super Bowl LIX is finally ended and the newly elected president of the United States of America, Donald Trump, made history by being the first president in office to actually watch the Super Bowl live. This will be Donald Trump’s second time watching the Super Bowl live after watching it for the first time in 1992. While Donald Trump had earlier refused to answer which team he is supporting, it seems like now he has revealed that and Kansas City Chiefs ’ owner’s daughter, Gracie Hunt , has a few things things to say about it.Even though Donald Trump has refused to answer the team he is supporting in Super Bowl LIX, he has hinted at a quarterback. Many fans believe Donald Trump has been hinting at Patrick Mahomes, the quarterback of the Kansas City Chiefs.When the Kansas City Chiefs won the AFC Championship against the Buffalo Bills a few weeks ago, Donald Trump’s post on X had gone viral. The post read as, “Congratulations to the Kansas City Chiefs. What a GREAT Team, Coach, Quarterback, and virtually everything else, including those fantastic FANS, that voted for me (MAGA!) in record numbers.”Now it seems like Clark Hunt’s daughter, Gracie Hunt had a few things to say about it when she appeared on the “Gaines for Girls” podcast. Gracie Hunt spoke about how reading Donald Trump’s post on X for the Kansas City Chiefs has been “pretty awesome” and “absolutely incredible”.She continues, “Sometimes I just look at whoever I’m talking to and I’m like yeah that just wasn’t on my 2025 bingo card.”With the Super Bowl LIX beginning in just a few hours, many fans feel Donald Trump’s presence in the Super Bowl LIX is a sign that the Kansas City Chiefs are set to break records and win the trophy again.The Kansas City Chiefs have already made history by being the only team in the NFL which has made an appearance at the Super Bowl for seven times now. In the last couple of years, the Kansas City Chiefs have been able to manage a winning streak at the Super Bowl but unfortunately, suffered a defeat this year at the Super Bowl LIX.Saquon Barkley led the Philadelphia Eagles has become one of the strongest teams in the NFL and they were able to beat the Kansas City Chiefs and win the match last night.Also Read: Travis Kelce and Patrick Mahomes set to gift Rolex worth close to $22,000 to Chiefs members if they win Super Bowl LIX, with a Caribbean vacation planned
Article Summary: President donald trump will watch the super bowl live, becoming the first sitting us president to do so. He has shown support for the kansas city chiefs, hinting at quarterback patrick mahomes. The chiefs, facing the philadelphia eagles, aim to win super bowl lix which begins at 6:30 pm et.

Article Title: Super Bowl LIX: Viral Video Shows Woman Using ‘Voodoo’ on Patrick Mahomes During Super Bowl LIX
Article Text:
kirawontmiss - X

A Woman Was Seen Holding A Voodoo Doll Of Patrick Mahomes During Super Bowl Lix Did her spell actually work? "That explains the Chiefs' loss" Another added, Whatever it takes, I guess!!! Lol" "That doll is a representation of someone, so whatever she’s doing to that doll is also happening to somebody," "She was just playing with a doll, guys. Calm down." The 2025 Super Bowl had everything—thrilling plays, jaw-dropping moments, and, apparently, witchcraft? A now-viral video has the internet in a frenzy after a woman was caught on camera seemingly performing voodoo magic on a doll that appeared to represent Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes.Posted on X (formerly Twitter) by @kirawontmiss, the footage shows a woman in Philadelphia Eagles green tapping and handling a tiny doll wrapped in red and white—the unmistakable colors of the Chiefs. Given that Mahomes had one of his worst games in the NFL, many online can’t help but wonder:Fans were quick to jump in with their takes, some jokingly crediting the Eagles' victory to her supernatural efforts.one user quipped.While some found the moment hilarious, others weren’t so sure. Some concerned fans called for witchcraft to be outlawed, while others shrugged it off as just a harmless game-day ritual.one person wrote. Another simply laughed it off:Regardless of whether voodoo had anything to do with it, Mahomes did not look like his usual self. The two-time MVP struggled, and the Chiefs’ offense never found its rhythm. Could it be the pressure? A bad game plan? Or did a certain mystical fan really throw off his mojo?True or not, this bizarre Super Bowl moment has become one of the most talked-about storylines of the game. Whether she was a modern-day sorceress or just a passionate Eagles fan with a lucky charm, the internet has already dubbed her the " Super Bowl Witch "—and if Mahomes ever struggles in another big game, you can bet fans will be watching for her in the crowd.What do you think—was it all just a coincidence, or did we just witness football’s strangest curse in action?Also read - Anne Hathaway Cheers Loudly for Eagles While Taylor Swift Gets Booed at Super Bowl LIX
Article Summary: A woman was caught on camera seemingly performing voodoo magic on a doll that appeared to represent kansas city chiefs quarterback patrick mahomes. Mahomes had one of his worst games in the nfl, and the chiefs’ offense never found its rhythm. The internet has already dubbed her the " super bowl witch "

Article Title: "I would like a marriage": FOX Sports reporter Erin Andrews believes Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are ready for the next big relationship milestone
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Erin Andrews Cheers on Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s Love Story, Hints at a Future Wedding



Will Super Bowl Sunday Bring a Surprise Proposal?



FOX Sports reporter Erin Andrews has never been shy about her love for Taylor Swift . A self-proclaimed Swiftie , Andrews has often expressed her admiration for the global superstar, even sharing how magical her experience was when she attended Swift’s Eras Tour in London. However, beyond being a devoted fan of Swift’s music, Andrews has also praised the singer for influencing gameday fashion and making it fashionable for women to embrace both sports and style.Recently, Erin Andrews once again showered Swift with appreciation, emphasizing how the pop icon has “made it cool” for women to love sports while looking great. But perhaps what excites the veteran sports reporter even more is Swift’s relationship with Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce. Andrews has been an outspoken supporter of the high-profile romance, even predicting that the couple might be on the verge of a major milestone.In a recent interview at the NFL’s Super Bowl shop in New Orleans, where she was promoting her WEAR by Erin Andrews collection, the sportscaster openly expressed her desire to see Swift and Kelce take their relationship to the next level. "I would like a marriage," she told PEOPLE, making it clear that she envisions wedding bells in the couple’s future."Man, they're great," Andrews continued. "I love them so much. I think they are so cute, and I love how they support each other. They're adorable."Andrews and her Calm Down with Erin and Charissa podcast co-host Charissa Thompson had playfully suggested the idea of Swift and Kelce dating during an August 2024 episode, months before the couple became official. At the time, Kelce had publicly shared his disappointment at not being able to meet Swift backstage during one of her Kansas City concerts. Sensing a perfect opportunity, Thompson made a direct appeal to the singer, saying, "Please try our friend Travis. He is fantastic.” Meanwhile, Andrews added, "Take us up on this. Go on a date with this guy. Do it for America."While Andrews acknowledges that she and Thompson can’t take full credit for the romance, she takes pride in having played a small role in encouraging Swift to give Kelce a chance. "We just suggested he's such a great guy. He's so fun to be around as everybody sees. He's just got this amazing personality. He's super funny," Andrews recalled.As Travis Kelce and the Chiefs prepare to defend their Super Bowl title against the Philadelphia Eagles, Swift is expected to be in attendance at the Superdome in New Orleans. With all eyes on the power couple, speculation has been mounting about a possible post-game proposal. Fans are eager to see if Kelce will take this golden opportunity to pop the question, fulfilling Andrews’ wish for the couple.Also Read: Jason Kelce shrugs off extra halftime rest advantage as brother Travis Kelce gears up for fifth Super Bowl appearance With FOX Sports covering the event, Andrews may have the perfect chance to witness history unfold—both on and off the field. Now, the Super Bowl 59 is over and Travis Kelce's Chiefs could not make history of three peat. An interesting future awaits from here. Chiefs lost the game to eagles by 40-22.
Article Summary: Erin andrews has expressed her admiration for taylor swift's relationship with travis kelce. The fox sports reporter has predicted that the couple might be on the verge of a major milestone. "i think they are so cute, and i love how they support each other. They're adorable," andrews said.

Article Title: Los Angeles Lakers' Luka Doncic is Quite Confident in His New Team and What They Can Achieve in the NBA
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty)

Luka Doncic says the current LA Lakers team is "very dangerous"



The pre-game pep talk was one of the best things for Luka Doncic



Luka Doncic just had his debut in the gold and purple jersey of the Los Angeles Lakers at the Crypto.com Arena. And it was an exciting match, to say the least, with the Lakers winning against the Utah Jazz 132-113. Doncic himself scored 14 points in 24 minutes, with 5 rebounds and 4 assists. The Lakers also had a special gift for everyone who attended the game, as they gave away a #77 Lakers shirt to everyone present. Even the players were seen wearing Luka's #77 shirt during the pregame and the atmosphere was pretty great all around.After the Lakers won the game, Luka Doncic had a brief conversation with ESPN , where he was asked how dangerous the current team could be for the rest of the league. To this, Doncic's response was pretty straightforward, as he termed the team to be "very dangerous." He further added:"I think the ball was moving very well... I was just happy to be in the court again."Luka Doncic missed a couple of games because of a calf strain since he joined the Lakers. So, finally getting to have his first game with so much cheer and excitement surrounding him, was definitely a positive.Before the game against the Utah Jazz, the team was on the court getting warmed up during the pre-game. They also huddled together for a quick pep talk, where LeBron James could be heard saying:"Luka, be your f---ing self. Don't fit in, fit the f--- out."Doncic admitted that he was nervous before the game, but it all vanished once he was on the court."I (don’t remember) the last time I was nervous before the game. But once I stepped on the court again, it was fun. Just being out there, it felt amazing."He also spoke of how the little words of encouragement from his teammates meant the world to him. Especially pointing out James' words, he said:"For him to say something like that just feels amazing. It gives me confidence. And after that speech, it was chills. I was just happy to be a part of it."The team will come together once more before the NBA All-Star Weekend starts on February 14. Hopefully, fans will get to see more of Luka-LeBron in the upcoming games.Also Read: NBA Star Luka Doncic Had a "special moment" On His Los Angeles Lakers Debut After a Deafening Introduction
Article Summary: Luka doncic made his debut for the los angeles lakers against the utah jazz. He scored 14 points in 24 minutes, with 5 rebounds and 4 assists. Lebron james gave a pre-game pep talk to luka, saying: "luka, be your f---ing self. Don't fit in, fit the f--- out"

Article Title: Could Taylor Swift get spotted wearing a $12 million engagement ring today? Speculation grows over a proposal at Super Bowl LIX
Article Text:
Image via Tatiana/BACKGRID

Taylor Swift Might Get Proposed Today At The Super Bowl LIX With A Ring Worth $12 Million



Taylor Swift Is Confirmed To Be Attending The Super Bowl LIX Today



Super Bowl LIX is beginning in a few hours and fans are all excited to watch Taylor Swift cheering on for her boyfriend, the NFL star, Travis Kelce. The two have been dating for over a year now and looking at how close they have become, fans are speculating an engagement soon. There are also many speculations that Taylor Swift might get proposed to by Travis Kelce if the Kansas City Chiefs win the trophy today.Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been able to build a pretty strong relationship and the two are quite close to each other’s family as well. As per RadarOnline’s report in December, the NFL star, Travis Kelce, had been “looking for engagement rings”.But of course, it is just not any ring for the billionaire pop star. As per RadarOnline’s source, Travis Kelce is looking for a ring worth a whopping $12 million. The reason for this is, "The rule is the ring should be worth a good three months' salary.”In the last few days, Travis Kelce has been asked about his thoughts on proposing to his girlfriend, Taylor Swift, at the Super Bowl and he neither denied this idea nor accepted it. A few days ago, when a reporter asked him about giving a ring to Taylor Swift at the Super Bowl, Travis Kelce gave a pretty cheeky reply to it. As per The Independent, he said, “A Super Bowl ring? Next question,”While there are no confirmed reports whether Travis Kelce will be proposing to Taylor Swift today, fans are desperately hoping for it.A fan took to X and wrote, “As a Taylor Swift fan, two things I don’t want to see happen today: 1. Her popping out as a guest during Kendrick’s Super Bowl halftime show to sing Bad Blood 2. A Taylor / Travis marriage proposal at the Super Bowl if the Chiefs win”Another fan wrote, “Your daily reminder leading up to the super bowl that the Chiefs will win and Taylor Swift will get a marriage proposal.”Many fans also feel that Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are pretty private people and would like their proposal to be private rather than so public, in front of billions of fans. But then again, today is one of the most important days in Travis Kelce’s life so there is a possibility that if the Kansas City Chiefs win today, we will all see Travis Kelce going down on one knee at the stadium with a beautiful ring worth a whopping $12 million.Super Bowl LIX begins at 6:30 PM ET and Taylor Swift is confirmed to be attending the match today.Also Read: Philadelphia Eagles player's comments about Taylor Swift raise eyebrows, sparking outrage before Super Bowl LIX
Article Summary: Super bowl lix begins at 6:30 pm et and taylor swift is confirmed to be attending the match. There are many speculations that taylor swift might get proposed to by travis kelce if the kansas city chiefs win the trophy today. As per radaronline’s report in december, the nfl star had been “looking for engagement rings”

Article Title: Blake Lively's friendship with Taylor Swift in question after noticeably absent from Swift's Super Bowl suite, as Justin Baldoni's court date approaches
Article Text: Blake Lively's lawsuit against Justin Baldoni is reportedly affecting her relationship with Taylor Swift, who is rumored to have not invited Lively to the Super Bowl this year. However, sources claim Swift is not distancing herself from Lively amid the legal drama.
Article Summary: Blake lively's lawsuit against justin baldoni is reportedly affecting her relationship with taylor swift. Swift is rumored to have not invited lively to the super bowl this year. But sources claim swift is not distancing herself from lively amid the legal drama.

Article Title: Luka Doncic’s Dallas Mavericks salary vs his new Los Angeles Lakers deal: A complete breakdown
Article Text:
Luka Doncic. Image via: Jae C. Hong / AP

What was Luka Doncic’s salary with the Dallas Mavericks?

Luka Doncic. Image via: Jerome Miron-Imagn Image

How much will Luka Doncic earn with the Los Angeles Lakers?



Luka Doncic’s contract situation has been a hot topic as he transitions from the Dallas Mavericks to the Los Angeles Lakers . Fans are eager to know how his salary with the Mavericks compares to his new deal in L.A. Doncic previously signed a lucrative extension with Dallas, making him one of the highest-paid players in the league. Now, with his move to the Lakers, his contract details are drawing even more attention. Here’s a closer look at his earnings and what his new deal means for his future. Luka Doncic entered the NBA in 2018 after a successful stint with Real Madrid, where he made his senior debut at just 16. He was originally selected third overall by the Atlanta Hawks in the 2018 NBA Draft but was quickly traded to the Dallas Mavericks for Trae Young and a future first-round pick.Doncic signed a four-year rookie contract with Dallas in July 2018, earning $5.5 million in his first season and $6.4 million in his second. His early years with the Mavericks set the stage for his rise as one of the league’s top players.Doncic secured a historic five-year rookie extension worth $215.16 million, the largest in NBA history at the time. The deal averaged $43 million per season, starting at $37.1 million in his first year and increasing to $43 million by the 2024-25 season.Doncic’s move to the Los Angeles Lakers comes with financial trade-offs, as he will earn less than he could have with the Mavericks. Under NBA rules, a player must stay with their original team to qualify for a supermax extension . By leaving Dallas, Doncic forfeited the chance at a five-year, $345 million deal tied to 30% of the salary cap.Still, his earning potential remains strong. If he renegotiates this summer, he could sign a four-year, $228 million extension. Combined with the $43 million left on his current deal, his total contract value would reach $271 million.Doncic has made his Lakers debut sharing the court alongside LeBron James and the Co. His debut was highly anticipated but fans were also curious about the current state of his salary in the new team. Still, the five-time NBA All-Star is one of the highest-paid stars in the league.Also Read: Inside NBA's Most Shocking Trade: Los Angeles Lakers Prioritizing Luka Doncic Is Not Going Unnoticed by LeBron James' Camp Currently, Doncic sits with a stunning $58 million fortune (according to Forbes). Most of his earnings come from his NBA salary and his brand deals. The 25-year-old Slovenian basketball star reportedly earns $15 million from brand deals. He was ranked 9th in the Highest-Paid NBA Players list while securing the 34th spot in the World's Highest-Paid Athletes list in 2024.
Article Summary: Luka doncic’s contract situation has been a hot topic as he transitions from the dallas mavericks to the los angeles lakers. Fans are eager to know how his salary with the mavericks compares to his new deal in l.a. The 25-year-old slovenian basketball star reportedly earns $15 million from brand deals.

Article Title: Anne Hathaway Eagles Super Bowl 2023: Anne Hathaway Cheers Loudly for Eagles While Taylor Swift Gets Booed at Super Bowl LIX
Article Text:
Photo: Getty Images

Anne Hathaway Was the Ultimate Eagles Fan at the Super Bowl

The Princess Diaries





Hollywood royalty met Philly football fever as Anne Hathaway stole the show at the Super Bowl, celebrating the Eagles’ epic victory over the Chiefs. The award-winning actress, a die-hard Eagles fan, was caught on camera living her best life as her team dominated the field, and her excitement was so intense that she could hardly breathe!Dressed in a simple white shirt and a green sweater—repping her team’s colors—Hathaway was the picture of pure joy as she cheered on the Eagles. Every touchdown, every defensive stop, and every moment of Kansas City’s struggle had her on the edge of her seat, reacting with ecstatic screams, shocked expressions, and enthusiastic cheers.It wasn’t just the cameras capturing her unfiltered fandom; even the NFL got in on the fun. The league’s official social media accounts posted a video of Hathaway celebrating, playfully captioning it, "The Princess of Genovia loves the Birds!"—a nod to her iconic role inWhile fans seemed to love Anne Hathaway, Taylor Swift found herself on the receiving end of boos. The boos echoed through the venue, creating an uncomfortable moment for the superstar.This wasn’t just a casual Super Bowl watch party for Hathaway—her Eagles fandom runs in the family. Her parents met at LaSalle University in Philadelphia, and her grandfather was a well-known radio personality in the city. Supporting the Eagles isn’t just about football for her; it’s about family and hometown pride.And what a game it was! The Eagles dominated the Chiefs with a commanding 40-22 win, dashing Kansas City’s hopes for a historic three-peat. For Hathaway, it was a moment of triumph, and she made sure to soak up every second of it.For Eagles fans, this Super Bowl win was more than just another victory—it was a statement. And for Anne Hathaway, it was the perfect night to let loose and celebrate her team’s dominance. From Hollywood to Philly, the excitement was undeniable, and Hathaway was right at the heart of it, proving that some fairytale endings really do come true—at least in football!Also read - Why Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift Stayed Apart at the Super Bowl—The Political Drama Behind the Scenes
Article Summary: Anne hathaway is a die-hard eagles fan. The actress was caught on camera living her best life at the super bowl. The eagles dominated the chiefs with a commanding 40-22 win, dashing kansas city’s hopes for a historic three-peat.

Article Title: MLB insider Bob Nightengale finds Pete Alonso 'looser' after turning down $71 Million deal for $54 Million with NY Mets
Article Text:
MLB insider Bob Nightengale finds Pete Alonso 'looser' after turning down $71 Million deal for $54 Million with NY Mets (Image Source: Getty)

MLB analyst Bob Nightengale reveals reason for finding Pete Alonso as offseason 'looser'

"No one’s free-agent value came crashing down mightier than Alonso’s. It was two years ago that he turned down a seven-year, $158 million extension. It was four months ago that he was seeking close to a $200 million payday. He was left with a two-year, $54 million contract with the Mets that no could possibly have envisioned."

"Certainly, he could have gotten a bigger payday if he wanted to play for the

Toronto Blue Jays

. He even rejected a three-year, $85 million contract in January from the Mets, which was heavily deferred, and ultimately even passed on a three-year, $71 million proposal."

"Once I got the news that we got Pete back -- big smile on my face. I'm excited to have Pete back and what the team was able to do this offseason. I can't wait to get going. Even though it was a very good year for us last year, we didn't accomplish the ultimate goal, which is to win a championship. So we’ve got to move on."

Earlier this month, the New York Mets succeeded in re-signing their star player Pete Alonso . While most fans were happy about Alonso's return to the Mets, MLB critics like Bob Nightengale found him among the "losers" of the offseason. In his recent report, the MLB insider talked in detail about his controversial take.On Sunday, Bob Nightengale released a report with USA Today, during which he talked about his reasons for finding Pete Alonso as one of the "losers" of the offseason. According to Nightengale, Alonso rejected multiple great offers just to settle for an underpaying one. Talking about the same in his report, Nightengale said:Bob Nightengale's statement makes complete sense, considering how Pete Alonso and his agent rejected multiple great offers from the Mets and ended up settling for a much lower-valued contract. It could be the reason why the Mets find Jose Iglesias a "more valuable player" than Alonso.Apart from the fans, NY Mets manager Carlos Mendoza recently shared his feelings on Pete Alonso's re-signing. Sharing his reaction during an interview with MLB Network Radio, Mendoza said:Pete Alonso has been reported to start behind Juan Soto, and according to former Mets star Chris Gimenez , it will help Alonso become a "better version of himself" going into the 2025 MLB season.
Article Summary: Mlb insider bob nightengale finds pete alonso 'looser' after turning down $71 million deal for $54 million with ny mets. Mlb critics like bob nightengale found pete alonso among the "losers" of the offseason.

Article Title: Trump Taylor Swift Relationship: Why Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift Stayed Apart at the Super Bowl—The Political Drama Behind the Scenes
Article Text:
David Eulitt/Getty Images

Brittany Mahomes Was Told to Avoid Taylor Swift at the Super Bowl—The Trump Factor Explained

Brittany kept her distance from Taylor because of Trump attending the game,

She was instructed to do so."

"The only one that had a tougher night than the Kansas City Chiefs was Taylor Swift... She got BOOED out of the Stadium. MAGA is very unforgiving!"

"Brittany is a pawn in Trump's game to get into her circle,"

"Trump knows about their friendship and will take any cheap shot he can at Taylor."

Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift had been inseparable throughout the NFL season, cheering on their partners, Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce, like the ultimate hype duo. But when the Kansas City Chiefs took the field at Super Bowl LIX in New Orleans, something was off. The two weren’t side by side, laughing and toasting like they had been all season. Instead, Swift was in her VIP suite with Ice Spice and the Haim sisters, while Brittany was nowhere in sight.So, what changed? Turns out, it wasn’t just bad seat planning—politics and a certain former president might have had something to do with it.According to reports, Brittany Mahomes was given strict instructions to keep her distance from Swift, all because Donald Trump was in attendance. The fear? That their friendship could somehow become a political distraction. Trump has had a long history of taking shots at Swift, especially after she endorsed Kamala Harris in the 2024 election." a source revealed. "And the concern wasn’t unfounded. When Swift was shown on the jumbotron, boos erupted from parts of the crowd. She exchanged a side-eye with her friends, clearly taken aback. Trump wasted no time chiming in, later posting on Truth Social:It’s no secret that Trump has been using Swift’s name as political ammo, and Brittany, knowingly or not, has been pulled into that mess.Adding another layer to the drama, Brittany Mahomes had previously liked a social media post that outlined Trump’s policies. While she never explicitly endorsed him, the internet took notice, and some Swifties weren’t too happy about it. Swift, on the other hand, has been vocal about her political beliefs, and the idea of the two being spotted together with Trump in the building could have been a PR headache waiting to happen.an insider explained.With all of that swirling in the background, keeping a little distance suddenly made a lot of sense.Despite the Super Bowl separation, Brittany and Swift still appear to be on good terms. Brittany was at Swift’s 35th birthday bash, and the two hung out before the big game with their partners. But going forward, it looks like their friendship might have to navigate more than just football season—it’s now tangled up in political narratives neither of them may have expected.Whether or not Trump continues to take jabs at Swift, one thing’s for sure—this year’s Super Bowl wasn’t just about football. It was a whole political spectacle, and Brittany Mahomes just found herself right in the middle of it.Also read - Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl Halftime Show Was a Real-Life PlayStation Game—Here’s What It All Meant
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes and taylor swift had been inseparable throughout the nfl season. When the kansas city chiefs took the field at super bowl lix, something was off. Swift was in her vip suite with ice spice and the haim sisters, while brittany was nowhere in sight. The fear? That their friendship could somehow become a political distraction.

Article Title: “Restraining order now”: Fans thrashed Travis Kelce's ex-girlfriend Kayla Nicole, urges him to file a restraining order against her
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Kelce Fans Explode After Kayla Nicole’s Super Bowl Clip Goes Viral

Kayla Nicole gets criticized for supporting the Eagles at the Super Bowl LIX

Kayla Nicole , ex-girlfriend of Travis Kelce , attended the 2025 Super Bowl with the Philadelphia Eagles , cheering for them against the Kansas City Chiefs . Kayla, 33, shared a video on Instagram showcasing her attendance at the Super Bowl in New Orleans, Louisiana. She shared a video of the crowd celebrating an Eagles touchdown and sang the team's fight song, "Fly, Eagles, Fly," with her friend Chrysty Gaither.While Kayla assumed that the Chiefs would come out victorious, she was likely happy that the Eagles were able to win the game with a score of 40-22. This led some fans to suggest that Travis Kelce should consider filing a restraining order against Kayla Nicole.Kayla Nicole, a fitness enthusiast and media personality, attended a game in New Orleans where the Eagles defeated her ex-boyfriend Travis Kelce's Kansas City Chiefs in a 40-22 victory. Nicole, who ended her relationship with the Chiefs' star tight end in 2022, shared her game-day experience with Eagles fans, capturing the moment they celebrated after a touchdown on Instagram Stories."Where’s the bandwagon emoji?" she jokingly captioned one of her posts, seemingly embracing her newfound allegiance. Nicole and her friend Chrysty Gaither participated in the Eagles' signature chant, spelling "E-A-G-L-E-S" with their hands and singing "Fly, Eagles, Fly," which caught the attention of fans, commenting on the bold move of publicly supporting Kelce's Super Bowl opponents."I mean… if she were a real fan, there would be no problem here," one NFL fan wrote on X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter. "However….. the obsession and tackiness is rampant. This chick is a bandwagon fan of anything and everything that rivals her ex that she’s still obsessed with after all these YEARS.""You know she's salty, looking for her next payday..." another said. "This wasn’t the look of pure joy for a team winning," a third chimed in. "It screams calculated in your face rub.”Nicole celebrated her Eagles' victory on the field after the game's dominant win. She shared a video on Instagram showcasing her skills in blowing up a pile of green and white confetti. She captioned the post as, "They said there’s room on the wagon y’all."Her reaction has gone viral, with some calling for Kelce to file a restraining order. "File the restraining order, bruh. I’m telling you," someone said as another echoed, "Restraining order now." Someone else claimed, "Oh, she's embarrassing herself."One X user wrote, "Travis Kelce’s ex out there celebrating with the Eagles on the field after the loss? Embarrassing. Imagine your entire personality being his ex and clinging to any crumb of relevance you can find. Sis, it’s time to move on and stop leeching off his name. Pathetic." Someone else said, "Girl, move on." "Thank God Travis dodged a bullet," another wrote.Also Read: Tom Brady took the opportunity to exact revenge on comedian Kevin Hart at the Super Bowl LIX Travis Kelce and Kayla Nicole, who first met in 2017, became a well-known couple, frequently attending events like the ESPY Awards and Kids' Choice Sports Awards. However, they experienced several breakups, with their final split occurring in 2022.
Article Summary: Kayla nicole, ex-girlfriend of travis kelce, attended the 2025 super bowl with the philadelphia eagles. She shared a video of the crowd celebrating an eagles touchdown and sang the team's fight song, "fly, eagles, fly" kelce and nicole broke up in 2022.

Article Title: The 2025 NBA All-star Weekend Will Be a Soiree of Celebrities: Performers, Celebrity Players, Ticket Prices, and Other Details Revealed
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty)

Who all are performing during the NBA All-Star Weekend?



Which celebrities will be playing during the All-Star Weekend?



Tickets for the NBA All-Star Weekend are on sale

The NBA All-Star Weekend is just a couple of days away, starting from February 14th, and will last till the 16th. The 2025 NBA All-Star concert series will take place in the Pier 48 in San Francisco, while the games will be held at the Chase Center. Home to the Golden State Warriors, this arena can hold 18,064 fans for basketball games. Now let's get into the details.A list of artists has been bagged to perform at the NBA All-Star Weekend. Continuing from his successful stint at last year's NBA All-Star Weekend, producer and DJ Zedd will be back to amaze the audience with his performance once again. We will also have rapper Flo-Rida to make the audience bop to his beats. And the two artists will be joined by rapper NAV to create a magical experience for everyone.Audiences will also get to see The Chainsmokers performing during the weekend. Noah Kahan will be there to mesmerize audiences, and 2 Chainz will also be giving a crowd-pleasing performance.And if you didn't know, one of their own, or well, almost their own, will also be performing during one of the All-Star nights. Basketball player LiAngelo Ball , brother to NBA stars Lonzo and LaMelo Ball will be at the game to perform his debut song Tweaker for the audiences.Other than the NBA All-Star Game , which has been divided into three teams - Team Shaq, Team Kenny, and Team Chuck, we will also have the Castor Rising Star Champions in Team Candace, in honor of WNBA legend Candace Parker. But other than the All-Stars, we will also have the All-Star Celebrity game, a staple during the weekend, which has been divided into two teams - Team Rice and Team Bonds - who will be playing the Ruffles Celeb Game.2 Chainz, who will be performing during the weekend will also serve as a coach to the celebrity game alongside Hall of Famer and three-time Super Bowl champion Jerry Rice for Team Rice. While San Francisco Giants legend Barry Bonds and influencer Khaby Lame will coach Team Bonds.The tickets for the NBA All-Star Weekend are now available on all levels via online portals. For the three-day pass, general admission tickets range from $400 to $500, while VIP tickets range from $800 to $1,800. As for single nights, the February 15 event will be headlined by Noah Kahan and is priced at $152. The February 16 one, with The Chainsmokers closing the weekend, is available for $204.It is going to be a fun weekend for basketball lovers, with some scintillating performances lighting up the events. The NBA TV & NBA App will have all the behind-the-scenes coverage, practice sessions, and special conferences. ESPN is set to cover the Celebrity Game. And TNT & TruTV will broadcast the Rising Stars, Saturday Night events, and the All-Star Game.Also Read: Beyond the Court: LiAngelo Ball's NBA All-Star Debut As a Singer Signals New Beginnings
Article Summary: The 2025 nba all-star concert series will take place in the pier 48 in san francisco, while the games will be held at the chase center. Producer and dj zedd will be back to amaze the audience with his performance once again. 2 chainz, who will be performing during the weekend will also serve as a coach to the celebrity game alongside hall of famer jerry rice for team rice.

Article Title: Will Scottie Barnes play tonight against the Philadelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Toronto Raptors star's injury report (February 11, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Scottie Barnes playing tonight? (Image via Getty)

Toronto Raptors

Scottie Barnes

Is Scottie Barnes playing tonight? Toronto Raptors’ injury report for tonight’s game against the Philadelphia 76ers (February 11, 2025)

Scottie Barnes’ impact on the Toronto Raptors squad

Philadelphia 76ers injury report for tonight’s game (February 11, 2025)

When and where to watch the game between the Toronto Raptors and the Philadelphia 76ers (February 11, 2025)?

Theare set to face the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday, February 11, at Wells Fargo Center, but all eyes are onand his status as the team navigates a lengthy injury report. Barnes, the Raptors’ standout forward, has been a consistent players for the Raptors this season, averaging 20 points, 7.5 rebounds, and 6 assists over the last 20 games. However, his availability remains a critical question mark as Toronto prepares for the matchup. The Raptors ’ injury report lists six players, with Scottie Barnes notably absent from the list, suggesting he is healthy and expected to play. Still, the team faces significant challenges with key players sidelined. Jakob Poeltl (hip) and Brandon Ingram (ankle) are out, while RJ Barrett (concussion) is day-to-day. Gradey Dick (concussion) and Jonathan Mogbo (undisclosed) are probable, offering some hope for depth.Barnes’ presence is vital for a Raptors squad struggling to stay competitive. Toronto ranks 21st in the NBA in scoring (110.7 points per game) and 25th in defense (116.5 points allowed per game). Barnes leads the team in rebounds (7.8 per game) and is a defensive anchor, averaging 1.6 steals and 1.5 blocks over the last 20 games. His ability to impact both ends of the floor makes him indispensable, especially against a 76ers team led by Tyrese Maxey, who ranks fourth in the league with 28.1 points per game.The 76ers are also dealing with injuries, including Joel Embiid (questionable, injury management) and Kyle Lowry (out, hip). Despite their own setbacks, Philadelphia’s offense remains potent, ranking 18th in three-point shooting (35.4%). The Raptors will need Scottie Barnes at his best to counter Maxey’s scoring and Kelly Oubre Jr.’s rebounding (6.5 per game).Also read: Will Joel Embiid play tonight against the Toronto Raptors? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (February 11, 2025) As tip-off approaches, the Raptors’ hopes hinge on Barnes’ health and performance. His absence would be a devastating blow for a team already battling injuries and inconsistency. Fans can catch the game at 7:00 PM ET on NBCS-PH and TSN or stream it live on Fubo.For now, the Raptors are holding their breath, hoping their star forward can lead them to a much-needed victory.
Article Summary: The toronto raptors are set to face the philadelphia 76ers on tuesday, february 11, at wells fargo center. The raptors ’ injury report lists six players, with scottie barnes notably absent from the list. Barnes, the raptors’ standout forward, has been a consistent players for the raptors this season, averaging 20 points, 7.5 rebounds, and 6 assists over the last 20 games.
